text: Novosphingobium mathurense is a Gram-negative and halophilic bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from oil-contaminated soil in Mathura in India. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Novosphingobium mathurense at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2009 Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Halophiles
title: Novosphingobium mathurense
